fixes.name: Delta Down USD Diff Fix
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD Fix] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau row-level multiplication [Delta Down T USD Fix] * [Date Sign] to DAX by mapping each field to 'TableName'[ColumnName] and using the * operator. Both referenced fields are preserved as references to the same table.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The referenced calculated field 'Date Sign' depends on a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date]); per rules, any calculation involving parameters must be created as a measure.
